Paragraph.Text: The Auto Excavator is a machine for digging large vertical shafts from below. It is not capable of digging out ore veins (Except on Rapid game mode).
Dig a small tunnel down to the bottom of the intended shaft and place the auto-excavator. It will need to be supplied with power from a Laser Power Transmitter or other power source.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Shaft Size: Maximum Shaft Height: Power Required: Power Capacity: Max. Power Recharge Rate: Maximum Excavation Rate:
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: 3m x 3m 512m 10 per 1m cube excavated 160 Unlimited 5 blocks per second
